body: You can grow wings that allow you to fly.
name: Tengu Wings
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tengus/New Racial Rules/Tengu Feats/Tengu Wings

sections.body: Once per day, you can sprout a pair of giant black crow's wings, granting you a fly speed of 30 feet (average maneuverability). This spell-like ability otherwise functions as beast shape I (though you do not gain any other benefits of that spell) with a caster level equal to your level.
sections.name: Benefit
